title: After the end
creator_credit: Paul Elliot, Michele Bolton and Armageddon Pictures
brief_description: A science fiction tale set in the future concerning humanity’s battle for survival in a poisoned nuclear landscape. Cast includes Gary Roche, Ronald Little, Bridget Archibald, Nadine Kempton.
